mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasktable (useName,founderId, taskName, taskText, taskCredit, updateTime, registerTime) values (#{useName},#{founderId},#{taskName},#{taskText},#{taskCredit},now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE usertable SET credit = credit + (SELECT taskCredit FROM tasktable WHERE taskId = #{id} AND useName = usertable.name), updateTime = now() WHERE name = (SELECT useName FROM tasktable WHERE taskId = #{id});
UPDATE detailusertable set allCompleteTask = allCompleteTask + 1 , dayCompleteTask = dayCompleteTask + 1 where useName = (select useName from tasktable where taskId = #{id})
mapper.select: select taskId,founderId,useName,taskName,taskText,taskCredit, checkTask,checkLove,t.updateTime,t.registerTime,u.userImage from tasktable t JOIN usertable u on t.useName = u.name where taskId = #{id};

select taskId,founderId,useName,taskName,taskText,taskCredit, checkTask,checkLove,t.updateTime,t.registerTime,u.userImage from tasktable t JOIN usertable u on t.useName = u.name where checkTask = #{id} and taskName like CONCAT('%', #{taskName}, '%') ORDER BY t.updateTime DESC;
